function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Training and awareness programs for employees, implementation of workplace redesign for social distancing","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Explore alternative supply chain options, provide temporary housing facilities for workers","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Engaging hci experts and stakeholders to explore and develop interactive tools for facility planning and analysis.","category":"Smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of curfews and restrictions, public awareness campaigns","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict infection control protocols, use of ppe, and regular testing","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further studies to gather epidemiologic data demonstrating the effectiveness of uvgi systems in preventing hais in healthcare for financial stability and health care","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of alternative energy sources, diversification of the energy mix, and investment in renewable energy technologies.","category":"Alternative energy sources","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Work with insurance companies and state and local health agencies to provide clear and accurate tools and maintain strict health and safety protocols during collaborative work","category":"Remote collaboration tools","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tailored marketing strategies, targeted messaging based on theoretical constructs, public health education","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote adherence to gathering size limits, use of outdoor spaces, and continued use of masks and physical distancing","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health interventions and education in nonmetropolitan
